title: Kei No Seishun
alternative_title: ケイの凄春 ; Kei no Seishun ; Kei, Chronicle of a Youth ; Kei, Crónica de una Juventud
status: ケイの凄春 ; Kei no Seishun ; Kei, Chronicle of a Youth ; Kei, Crónica de una Juventud
description:
Description :
        This story set in the Edo period, tells the love story of a young samurai who is in search for his beloved girlfriend.
